title: FAQs
subtitle: We Answer Everything, Except During Coffee Breaks

1.title: What Are Modjoy's Prices?
1.content: Prices depend on the complexity and desired features. For an accurate estimate, contact us! We'll analyze your needs and provide a tailored quote.

2.title: What Are Your Average Project Timelines?
2.content: Timelines? It depends on the project! On average, expect about 1 month, but it might take a bit longer if the project requires it.

3.title: What If I'm Not Satisfied with the Result?
3.content: No worries, you get 3 revisions to fine-tune everything until the result is exactly how you want it, 100%!

4.title: How Do You Ensure Project Quality and Follow-Up?
4.content: You'll have a dedicated point of contact from start to finish and a weekly meeting to track the project smoothly. Not bad, right?
